help_dx95: Sets the game to launch in DX9.5, which has improved graphics. Will restore regular graphics after RTX gameplay
help_steamdeck: Enables stability with threading for Linux based machines
help_startupvid: Disables all introductory videos from playing. Does not effect cutscenes
help_hardware: Disables hardware priority for textures, which can improve stability on newer machines
help_autoconfig: Automatically re-initializes the game in safe mode based on PC settings. This will only execute ONCE on launch and disable itself again
save_message:
You are about to exit the mod launcher! If you made any changes, they will not be saved.

Would you like to save your current config?
about_text:
The purpose of this mod launcher is to allow modders to easily add, overwrite, or modify existing content in Dark Messiah through an addon system.

Previously, all content in Dark Messiah would go through a single content folder or require gameinfo.txt edits that would complicate installation for many players.

Now, all mods may register their own self-contained content folders, launch parameters, gameinfo edits, even .cfg executions.

Players can even combine multiple mods and choose the order they load in, or if they load at all!
